income_messages:
From: g*******r@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 08:13:22
SUBJECT: OFFICE OF THE PAYMENT VERIFICA
OFFICE OF THE PAYMENT VERIFICATION PANEL, LAGOS LIAISON OFFICE
Date: 03:05:23
ATTENTION: BENEFICIARY ,
                          YOUR OUTSTANDING PAYMENT.
We hereby bring to your notice that your outstanding payment with the Federal Government of Nigeria has reached this office for verification and clarifications before the release. Without wasting much time, I have personally investigated this payment down to the Ministry where this contract was executed and from my findings it is clear that you did not execute this contract in question, from all available information, it looks like some officials in the Ministry were trying to use you to claim this particular value which they over invoiced for their own selfish interest. I know it might interest you to know how I managed to find out this truth, yes. I investigated this payment up to the ministry where this contract was executed and after some checks I was surprised to see that the most vital/important documents regarding this contract bear a different name and beneficiary.
Based on this I decide to contact the supervisor that signed the attestation report, on getting to the contract award and supervisory commission I collected the contract attestation report and found out that this document still bears the name: B&B PETROLEUM ENG.PTY as the company that executed this contract. I kept this to myself and came down to my base. As a matter of fact I have been thinking if to report my findings to the appropriate body for cancellation of this payment, but I have this second thought of contacting you since I am not a saint and in a position to approve this payment for the president to give go ahead order to the release, I feel this might be a Gods given opportunity.
So based on this I am writing to you, if you will accept my  conditions I can normalize all the relevant papers of this payment and the funds will be released within 14 working days. Contract attestation report is not in your name, the fund ownership certificate is also not in your name. Actually your partners, as I should say, did a very great job in manipulating almost all the documents to your favor.
Now, I want you to know that, with my position, I can amend this problem and this money will be paid to your nominated bank account which both of us will share on a 50/50 %if only you will accept my conditions. So, if you see it wise to get this perfected with me feel free.
I shall let you know my conditions as soon as I hear from you.
Thanks.
Mary Egbu
ChairLady Payment Verification Panel
From: g*******r@gmail.com
To: od67496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-11 19:16:02
SUBJECT: Clear picture
Greetings
Email received, concerns noted.
This transaction is %100 risk free.
Plan is simple. We prepare all logistics paperwork for the movement of the
funds on your name and we proceed which it's funding will be handled by you
based on the percentage you are getting as stipulated.
For fastest and secure movement of said funds, we can use the cash movement
system via Consignment boxes which will be two boxes sealed  and released
from the treasury unit here.
Once this is all set, dispatch proceedings will commence.
You shall be required to provide the followings:
Name in full
Country of origin
Current address
Direct phone number
Age
Occupation
Next of kin
Get back to me with above requirements and affirmation we are on the same
page
Treat as very urgent
Mrs Mary
outbound_messages:
From: od67496@l******s.email
To: g*******r@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-09 08:13:25
SUBJECT: Re: OFFICE OF THE PAYMENT VERIFICA
Hello Mary Egbu,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my payment with the Federal Government of Nigeria. I appreciate your efforts in investigating the matter and bringing it to my attention. Can you please provide me with more information about the conditions you mentioned? I would like to know more before making any decisions.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Calvin
From: od67496@l******s.email
To: g*******r@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-11 20:12:20
SUBJECT: Re: Clear picture
Hello Mrs. Mary,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate your offer, but I have some concerns regarding the logistics paperwork and the movement of funds. Can you please provide me with more information about the process and how it works? Also, I would like to know more about the percentage I will be receiving.
Regarding the cash movement system via boxes, can you please explain how it works and how it ensures the security of the funds?
I am hesitant to provide my personal information at this point, but I am interested in learning more about your proposal. Can you please provide me with more details before I proceed?
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Calvin
